title.rendered: Mining: because access to new resources is vitally important

content.rendered: VINCI Constructionoperates throughout the entire mining cycle. It builds the infrastructure needed to operate both underground and open-pit mines. Its services range from tunnel boring to development of operational sites, construction of special facilities and road construction.

excerpt.rendered: VINCI Construction designs and builds key infrastructure to support site operation in the mining sector, including tunnels, roads, operating facilities and special equipment.
